item.title: Mppkvvcl Various Post Dec24
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> Madhya Pradesh Paschim Kshetra Vidhyut Vitaran Company Ltd (MPPKVVCL) Madhya Pradesh Paschim Kshetra Vidhyut Vitaran Company Ltd (MPPKVVCL) MPEZ MPPKVVCL Various Post Recruitment 2024 Short Details of Notification MP Vidhut Vibhag Exam 2024 Application Fee General / Other State : 1200/-EWS / OBC : 600/-SC / ST : 600/-PH Candidates : 600/-Pay the Examination Fee Through Debit Card, Credit Card, Net Banking or Pay Offline Through E Challan Important Dates Application Begin : 24/12/2024Last Date for Apply Online : 23/01/2025Pay Exam Fee Last Date :23/01/2025Exam Date : As per ScheduleAdmit Card Available : Before Exam Eligibility Age Limit as on 01/01/2024Minimum Age : 18 YearsMaximum Age: 40 Years Age relaxation as per rules of MP Vidhut Vibhag Exam 2024 , Vacancy Details Total : 2573 Post Education-Wise Details Post Name Total Posts Eligibility Office Assistant Grade-III 818 10+2 Intermediate Exam From Any Recognized Board in India Degree / Diploma in Computer Proficiency CPCT Exam Passed More Eligibility Read the Notification Line Attendant (Distribution) 1196 Class 10th Pass with ITI Certificate in Electrician/Lineman/Wireman Security Sub-Inspector 07 Bachelor Degree in Any Stream Experience in Police/Armed Forces Junior Engineer (Plant)-Mechanical 14 Engineering Degree / Diploma in Related Trade / Branch Junior Engineer (Plant)-Electronics 03 Engineering Degree / Diploma in Related Trade / Branch Junior Engineer/Asst.
